Html:
It would be nice to select items from wowhead's Item Comparison useing the link to this page string. Where it would select all the items in the string as if they where checked as green so you could use wowhead to get the list of items and Rawr to give them a check for best item.

The wowhead sting looks like this:

http://www.wowhead.com/?compare=45085;44196;46076;44930;42101;44907;37149;42129;46081;46063;44906;46083;44891;46085;46084;41386;45847;45848;45830;45840;45839;45831;45822;45823;45819;45821;46184&weights=Druid%20-%20Balance%20%28DPS%29;119:103:123:96:23:61:24:77;100:46:46:43:26:15:8:-100

And it looks to me like it could be done easily enough to select all the items in that list, even if the user head to filter out the line a bit and just enter the "45085;44196;46076;44930;42101;44907;37149;42129;46081;46063;44906;46083;44891;46085;46084;41386;45847;45848;45830;45840;45839;45831;45822;45823;45819;45821;46184". That would be great...
Yeah, that could be done pretty easily. I'm not sure I understand the typical use case for this, but it'd be easy to do. In what ways would you use it?

Wowhead's filters are more configurable. I can filter for a single vendor, or a single faction, or even for a certain currency. I can also use it in raids to select all the possible drops for that dungeon and paste it to the various guild members I help, that would save time and a whole lot of clicks.
